We live and walk at Lago Vista on the Central Coast of California, where the fog and rain don't seem to get in our way. Our Family

Our Family is the family of Kenny and Laura. We have five children: Abigail (17), Austin (15), Carter (13), Chloe (12) and Zed (6). We also have an active young son in heaven.

We all share the same last name, though we're all in a different order, of course. :-) :-)

Our Son, Austin

Austin is an autistic teenager who struggles in our home. Sometimes it’s harder for those of us who parent him than it is for Austin. He is not just autistic, but he is also severely developmentally delayed. To make a long story short, we thought Austin was like most autistic individuals: hard to parent. We thought his challenges would be minimal thanks to his diagnosis. Boy, were we wrong!

Austin has a lot of physical challenges, as well as learning difficulties. His challenges with language are many and varied.
